roleset.name: concentrate into one location
roleset.note: RECENTRALIZE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to centralize.01. (from recentralize.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: In recent weeks , China 's leaders have recentralized trading in wool and scores of chemical products and commodities .
example.arg: trading in wool and scores of chemical products and commodities .
